1.content: Grant was arriving for his shift at his job. He was a janitor and had to clean things before the day started. He would be there all day to continue to clean and fix things. He goes into his supply area and begins to make up his cleaning solutions. Grant was so tired that he didn't even pay attention as he was mixing things. He grabs the wrong chemical and as soon as they hit each other there is a small explosion, not big enough to alert anyone. Grant gets thrown back against the wall and knocked out. When grant comes to he looked out and everything was different. Everything was now huge. He had shrunk to the size of a grain of salt. Grant knew he needed help and started to venture out to find help. Grant worked at...
1.title: Accidentally tiny

11.content: An elementary school! Grant had very little time to react before the school bell rang. A large group young boys and girls entered the cafeteria not knowing that there's a tiny person right below them. The shrunken teen tried his best to avoid the giant shoes stomping near him. Eventually a shoe came behind Grant and kicked him high into the air. He then landed on..
11.title: An elementary school

111.content: Grant lands on someone's pizza with a splat. The heat around him felt as if he were in a microwave. The pizza sauce stuck to him like hot mud. At least the smell wasn't as bad considering that all he could really smell is pizza. Soon a shadow loomed over Grant and the pizza below him shook as it was lifted up high into the air. Grant turned around and saw a 6 year old boy preparing to eat his lunch.
111.title: pizza

1111.content: Grant's screams were blocked off as the boy shoves the pizza in his mouth. Grant lands on his tongue with a splat. The boy then begins chewing tossing the shrunken boy around treating him as if he were just pizza topping. Grant screams as his body gets thrown around as the pizza around him gets turned into mush by the boy's teeth. Soon the boy finishes chewing and begins to swallow. Grant gets rolled in a glob of mush and gulped down the young boy's throat. The shrunken teen lands in the boy's hot stomach where it's already digesting some food. The smell around him was horrible. Grant could hear the stomach gurgle and churn as it digests the pizza. Outside, the boy pats his belly and lets out a wet burp.
1111.title: Eaten?

choices: try to find a way out.

The force of gravity caused the milk to rush out and into the boy's mouth. You swam as hard as you could but the current was too strong. You landed on the boy's tongue as he kept drinking. What do you do next?...

You notice that he hasn't eaten yet as you float around in the stomach acids and the milk. The smell around you was horrible as the walls around you gurgle and rumble in hunger. What happens?

The stomach that you were in began to rumble violently and the boy let out a burp. At that moment you began to get an idea. It wasn't the best but at least you had an escape plan. You then feel the boy stomach rumble again. You then jump up and got tossed in the stomach air current. Your small body is squeezed out of the boy's throat and flew out his mouth as the boy let out a wet burp. Where do you land?

Surprisingly to Grant that even though a child's foot was currently on top of him he was unharmed and not dead. 1451.title: A kid taking off his shoes

choices: Wait for the boy to take off his shoes again
14511.content: You had little time to think as the boy's foot came in and squished you under the sole. The young 8 year old wasn't wearing socks and his warm, meaty foot soaked you in warm sweat. The boy giggled and continued with his day not knowing someone is trapped in his shoe. As the day goes on, the boy was enjoying himself while you were in a nightmare. Each time the boy would walk you were squished and smothered by his warm foot. More sweat covered your body and you tried screaming for help but only got a mouthful of sweat followed by the boy's muffled laughs coming from outside.
14511.title: Squished

choices: A giant kid about to play with the ball
An adult throwing the ball back into the pit
1452.content: Grant's eyes went wide as a giant red ball bounces right in front of him. The ball was shiny and was rolling towards the small man. Grant went running, but was unable to escape and was smashed by the red ball. His body flattened out and became stuck to it. He was like a small pile of putty that was stuck to the ball. The ball kept rolling with Grant attached still attached. The ball was lifted high into the air as Grant saw...
1452.title: A ball from the pit

choices: Grant gets sucked off the ball
The parent pulls the ball out
14523.content: On top of the red ball Grant looked around as everything went dark. He wondered what happened. Did the power go out? Soon something begins to drip down onto Grant. It was slimy and sticky. He then pulled out his flashlight and saw huge teeth. A young kid had the ball in his mouth aucking on it.
14523.title: Just darkness

15.content: Grant worked at one of the largest waterpark in the state. Now it was the largest compared to Grant who was just a speck on the floor. The concrete was cold under Grant's feet and he ran towards the door and under it. Everything was so big and scary, but he knew he needed to get help or he would not last long being this tiny. As he ventures out into the commons area, a giant shadow sweeps over him. A father and his young boy were walking together clad in swim wear ready to hop into the pool. They were unaware of the speck size man in their path. Grant was even able to turn around in time to see before he was hit by a giant foot and sent flying through the air. He screamed as he looked and saw he was heading for...
15.title: A waterpark

151.content: You fly through the air after being kicked by the giants. You go a good ways before you start to lose altitude. You look down to see you are headed for a huge body of water. You had landed in....
151.title: The pool

153.content: Grant was screaming through the air as he was kicked. He soon saw where he was heading and could do nothing about it. Straight in-front of him was the giant concession stand full of food for the hungry customers. This was the worse place for a speck size man to land! There were several good items on the counter and Grant was heading straight for...
153.title: The concessions

1533.content: Grant began to get lower in the air. He closed his eyes waiting for impact with something hard. However, the impact never came. He finally landed and looked around. He could see he was in a bag filled with....
1533.title: A pack of opened candy

154.content: As The shrunken teen was falling he didn't want to see where he would land. He hoped it wasn't something hard. Grant's screams came to a stop when he landed on something soft. The teen opened his eyes and saw that he was on a blue towel. He then giggled and got up lucky that he wasn't dead. A dark shadow loomed over him and the towel that he was on got lifted. A young boy looking the age of 7 wrapped the towel around him and walked into the bathroom to change. Grant screamed as his body slipped down into the boy's butt crack. The feeling was dark, wet, and smelly. As the boy walked, his butt cheeks grind him with each step he took. The young boy walked into the bathroom stall wnd began changing. What does grant do?
154.title: A discarded towel

1541.content: Since the boy was soaked Grant just slid right out of the boys short and onto the floor of the changing room. He wanted away from the giant people. He walked around and ended up going into...
1541.title: slip out

info.brief_description: A janitor is shrunk to the size of salt at work one day
info.description:
18 year old Grant was working his janitor job when he shrinks after mixing some cleaning chemicals wrong.

Rules:
Males only
No interaction with adults
Keep poop and puke to a minimum
He is immortal
NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS THESE WILL BE DELETED. AT LEAST A PARAGRAPH Please.
No Females at all
Footplay is ok just keep it minimal

Any questions just ask, I will give gift points for great chapter additions.

Happy Reading
